name: Person Walking Motion
description: Tests motion coherence with a person walking across frame - moderate complexity to validate temporal consistency

sceneContext.summary: Single person walking slowly across a simple outdoor path
sceneContext.environment: Concrete park path with single wooden bench on right, single oak tree on left, soft overcast natural lighting

startKeyframe.prompt: A young woman in a red sweater, dark jeans, and white sneakers walking slowly on a concrete park path, positioned on the left side of frame, single wooden bench visible on right, single oak tree on left, overcast sky, soft diffused natural lighting, medium wide shot from the side, static camera, clean minimal composition, cinematic photography, 4K resolution, full body visible, simple background
startKeyframe.negativePrompt: blurry, noisy, artifacts, text, watermark, multiple people, complex background, night, indoor, close-up face, changing clothes, extra limbs, duplicated limbs, motion blur, abstract shapes

endKeyframe.prompt: A young woman in a red sweater, dark jeans, and white sneakers walking slowly on a concrete park path, positioned on the right side of frame, single wooden bench visible on right, single oak tree on left, overcast sky, soft diffused natural lighting, medium wide shot from the side, static camera, clean minimal composition, cinematic photography, 4K resolution, full body visible, simple background
endKeyframe.negativePrompt: blurry, noisy, artifacts, text, watermark, multiple people, complex background, night, indoor, close-up face, changing clothes, extra limbs, duplicated limbs, motion blur, abstract shapes

videoContext.motionDescription: Woman walks slowly and steadily from left to right across the frame over 3 seconds, maintaining consistent pose and stride
videoContext.cameraMotion: Completely static camera locked in place, only the person moves through the scene

expectedBehavior.primary: Person maintains consistent appearance (red sweater, dark jeans, white sneakers) throughout walk
expectedBehavior.secondary: Walking motion is slow, natural and smooth, no frame skipping or teleportation, background stays completely stable
expectedBehavior.challenges: Human body articulation, clothing consistency, natural gait cycle, footwear consistency
